alert.note: Alert for Parmer (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 10:51PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Parmer County through 1130 PM CDT... At 1051 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Grady, or 28 miles southeast of Tucumcari, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and thick blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bovina, Farwell, Oklahoma Lane, Lariat and Rhea. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If driving, prepare for abrupt reductions in visibility from blowing dust.
